character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM tm_guar_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_guar_base.insert */ INSERT INTO tm_guar_base ( guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
,guar_nm /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */
,guar_tel_no /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,guar_pw /* guar_pw 보호자_비밀번호 character varying(400) */

,devc_cert_val /* devc_cert_val 장치_인증_값 character varying(1000) */
,race_div_cd /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,wght_val /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,bmi_val /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,spos_no /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
,dzone_alam_yn /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,szone_alam_yn /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,fall_alam_yn /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,hbit_abnm_alam_yn /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,temp_abnm_alam_yn /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,body_hist_alam_yn /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,meal_noin_alam_yn /* meal_noin_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,excs_noin_alam_yn /* excs_noin_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,cbee_use_alam_yn /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,batr_lack_alam_yn /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,ltrm_nuse_alam_yn /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,entr_dt /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */
,rels_dt /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */
,rels_resn_cd /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */
,rels_resn_cntn /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(4000) */
,entr_stat_cd /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
,#{guarNm} /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */
,#{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */
,#{guarPw} /* guar_pw 보호자_비밀번호 character varying(400) */
,#{selfCertDttm} /* self_cert_dttm 본인_인증_일시 character(14) */
,#{autoLoginYn} /* auto_login_yn 자동_로그인_여부 character(1) */
,#{devcCertVal} /* devc_cert_val 장치_인증_값 character varying(1000) */
,#{raceDivCd} /* race_div_cd 인종_구분_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */ ,#{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */ ,#{bmiVal} /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,#{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
,#{dzoneAlamYn} /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{szoneAlamYn} /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{fallAlamYn} /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{hbitAbnmAlamYn} /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{tempAbnmAlamYn} /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{bodyHistAlamYn} /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{mealNoinAlamYn} /* meal_noin_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{excsNoinAlamYn} /* excs_noin_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{cbeeUseAlamYn} /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{batrLackAlamYn} /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */ ,#{ltrmNuseAlamYn} /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,#{entrDt} /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */
,#{relsDt} /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */
,#{relsResnCd} /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{relsResnCntn} /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(4000) */
,#{entrStatCd} /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_guar_base.update */ UPDATE tm_guar_base
,guar_nm = #{guarNm} /* guar_nm 보호자_명 character varying(40) */
,guar_tel_no = #{guarTelNo} /* guar_tel_no 보호자_전화_번호 character varying(20) */

,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */

,ltrm_nuse_alam_yn = #{ltrmNuseAlamYn} /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,entr_dt = #{entrDt} /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */
,rels_dt = #{relsDt} /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */
,rels_resn_cd = #{relsResnCd} /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */
,rels_resn_cntn = #{relsResnCntn} /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(4000) */
,entr_stat_cd = #{entrStatCd} /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */

,sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */
,hght_val = #{hghtVal} /* hght_val 키_값 numeric */
,wght_val = #{wghtVal} /* wght_val 체중_값 numeric */
,bmi_val = #{bmiVal} /* bmi_val BMI_값 numeric */
,spos_no = #{sposNo} /* spos_no 배우자_번호 numeric */
,dzone_alam_yn = #{dzoneAlamYn} /* dzone_alam_yn 위험지역_알림_여부 character(1) */
,szone_alam_yn = #{szoneAlamYn} /* szone_alam_yn 세이프존_알림_여부 character(1) */
,fall_alam_yn = #{fallAlamYn} /* fall_alam_yn 낙상_알림_여부 character(1) */
,hbit_abnm_alam_yn = #{hbitAbnmAlamYn} /* hbit_abnm_alam_yn 심박_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */
,temp_abnm_alam_yn = #{tempAbnmAlamYn} /* temp_abnm_alam_yn 체온_이상_알림_여부 character(1) */
,body_hist_alam_yn = #{bodyHistAlamYn} /* body_hist_alam_yn 신체_기록_알림_여부 character(1) */
,meal_noin_alam_yn = #{mealNoinAlamYn} /* meal_noin_alam_yn 식사_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */
,excs_noin_alam_yn = #{excsNoinAlamYn} /* excs_noin_alam_yn 운동_미입력_알림_여부 character(1) */
,cbee_use_alam_yn = #{cbeeUseAlamYn} /* cbee_use_alam_yn 캐시비_사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,batr_lack_alam_yn = #{batrLackAlamYn} /* batr_lack_alam_yn 배터리_부족_알림_여부 character(1) */
,ltrm_nuse_alam_yn = #{ltrmNuseAlamYn} /* ltrm_nuse_alam_yn 장기_미사용_알림_여부 character(1) */
,entr_dt = #{entrDt} /* entr_dt 가입_일자 character(8) */
,rels_dt = #{relsDt} /* rels_dt 해지_일자 character(8) */
,rels_resn_cd = #{relsResnCd} /* rels_resn_cd 해지_사유_코드 character varying(20) */
,rels_resn_cntn = #{relsResnCntn} /* rels_resn_cntn 해지_사유_내용 character varying(4000) */
,entr_stat_cd = #{entrStatCd} /* entr_stat_cd 가입_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : tm_guar_base.delete */ DELETE FROM tm_guar_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
